title: Tale Tagging
content:
[[=]]
++ **This workbench is for genre tagging of tales.**

++ **If you are interested in tagging tales, please read [[[genre-tagging-guide| the guide for genre tagging]]] first. For tales not on this list please also consult the  [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/a-laymen-s-guide-to-tagging| The Laymen's Guide To Tagging]]].**
[[/=]]

[[module ListPages category="_default" order="date" tags="tale -absurdism -action -adventure -bittersweet -bleak -breakout -comedy -black-comedy -chase -crime-fiction -fantasy -heartwarming -horror -body-horror -cosmic-horror -psychological-horror -metafiction -military-fiction -mystery  -romance -science-fiction -slice-of-life -spy-fiction -surrealism -xenofiction -artificial-intelligence -bureaucracy -ghost -historical -legal -lgbtq -murder-monster -mythological -political -religious-fiction -superhero -afterlife -alternate-history -apocalyptic -post-apocalyptic -christmas -corporate -dystopian -halloween -otherworldly -period-piece -school -space-opera -western -utopian -correspondence -first-person -foundation-format -journal -no-dialogue -second-person -worldbuilding -_genreless" perPage="100" prependLine="||~ Title ||~ Author ||~ Date Created ||" separate="false"]]
|| **[[[*%%link%% | %%title%%]]]** || %%author%% || %%created_at%% ||
[[/module]]

[[module CountPages category="_default" tags="tale -absurdism -action -adventure -bittersweet -bleak -breakout -comedy -black-comedy -chase -crime-fiction -fantasy -heartwarming -horror -body-horror -cosmic-horror -psychological-horror -metafiction -military-fiction -mystery  -romance -science-fiction -slice-of-life -spy-fiction -surrealism -xenofiction -artificial-intelligence -bureaucracy -ghost -historical -legal -lgbtq -murder-monster -mythological -political -religious-fiction -superhero -afterlife -alternate-history -apocalyptic -post-apocalyptic -christmas -corporate -dystopian -halloween -otherworldly -period-piece -school -space-opera -western -utopian -correspondence -first-person -foundation-format -journal -no-dialogue -second-person -worldbuilding -_genreless"]]
 Currently %%total%% pages have not been tagged 
[[/module]]     
[[module CountPages category="_default" tags="tale"]]

[[/module]]
author: psychicprogrammer
